name: Forretress
author: Tomokazu Komiya
flavor_text: It is encased in a steel shell. Its peering eyes are all that can be seen of its mysterious innards.

abilities.name: Thorn Tempest
abilities.effect: When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon, you may put 1 damage counter on each of your opponent’s Pokémon.

attacks.name: Iron Crash
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 more damage for each {C} in your opponent’s Active Pokémon’s Retreat Cost.
